thread.title: And right here is the memorial to stupidity
thread.title_full: And right here is the memorial to stupidity - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jon Carroll
title: And right here is the memorial to stupidity
text: I was woolgathering this morning, staring out at a plummeting hummingbird and thinking about stuff, when the topic of Confederate monuments crossed my mind. I don’t spend a lot of time thinking about them — it’s not exactly a topic of concern in California — and I’m not sure what got me started.
